title: Client crash
body: So my client has "Stopped responding" twice while I was in champion select for ranked and this has happened twice now, please fix?

replies.body: This response error is usually caused by a bad or poor connection that's lost comms with the server.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network's strength and fix this up.  Definitely test it out in a custom game to prevent any more dodges.  Let me know if you have any questions!
This happened when I was 3 or 4 games into playing, I have other friends that have also had this problem and one of them just said to use the alpha client because the current client is so buggy.
